contentList.content: Takes [1] at the start of each turn, for each round of Burning on the target.
Takes [1] at the start of each turn, for each round of Holy Fire on the target. Takes [2] for each round of Holy Fire instead, if the target is a Fiend or Undead.
Release a fraction of your inner fire. All nearby creatures take damage and have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> applied for [1] turns.

Takes [1] at the start of each turn, for each round of Bleeding on the target. Has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

When you receive healing you must succeed a Constitution Saving Throws to cure the bleeding.

Takes [1] at the start of each turn, for each round of Heavy Bleeding on the target. Has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

When you receive healing you must succeed a Constitution Saving Throws to cure the bleeding.

Prevented from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to[1]. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag> dealing[2] and[3] have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against the entity, and they suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against associated effects.
Can't speak or cast spells with a verbal component.
Deafened

Unable to hear. Automatically fail <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> that require hearing and succeed on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against effects that require you to hear them.
While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="THREATENED">Threatened</LSTag>, affected entity has a bonus to damage with spells equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

Turned to stone. Can't move or take <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Actions</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">Bonus Actions</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to all damage.

Trapped in a spider's web. Can't move or take Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions.

The condition ends upon taking damage.
Take [1] when moving for each [2] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">moved</LSTag>. Each time you receive damage from this condition, reduce the duration by [3].

Affected entity has Disadvantage on Dexterity Saving Throws.

When there are [1] or more turns remaining, the entity must succeed a Constitution Saving Throw or become Frozen. On a successful save, take [2]. Afterward, the frost sloughs away.

Removed by Burning.
Affected entity is utterly enamelled in ice and is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">incapacitated</LSTag>. If it is dealt[1],[2], or[3], the ice shatters, ending the condition.
You have a +1 bonus to damage when throwing or <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacking</LSTag> with a melee weapon, for every turn this condition has remaining.
Stop Drop and Roll
You're on fire! Smother the flames by going <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Stopped Dropped and Rolling
This creature has voluntarily gone <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> to smother the flames.
